org.apache.flink.metrics.reporter

接口 MetricReporter

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractReporter

    public interface MetricReporter
    Reporters are used to export Metrics to an external backend.

    Reporters are instantiated via reflection and must be public, non-abstract, and have a public no-argument constructor.

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void close()
      Closes this reporter.
      void notifyOfAddedMetric(Metric metric, String metricName, MetricGroup group)
      Called when a new Metric was added.
      void notifyOfRemovedMetric(Metric metric, String metricName, MetricGroup group)
      Called when a Metric was should be removed.
      void open(MetricConfig config)
      Configures this reporter.

    • 方法详细资料

      • open

        void open(MetricConfig config)
        Configures this reporter. Since reporters are instantiated generically and hence parameter-less, this method is the place where the reporters set their basic fields based on configuration values.

        This method is always called first on a newly instantiated reporter.

        参数:
        config - A properties object that contains all parameters set for this reporter.

      • close

        void close()
        Closes this reporter. Should be used to close channels, streams and release resources.

      • notifyOfAddedMetric

        void notifyOfAddedMetric(Metric metric,
                         String metricName,
                         MetricGroup group)
        Called when a new Metric was added.
        参数:
        metric - the metric that was added
        metricName - the name of the metric
        group - the group that contains the metric

      • notifyOfRemovedMetric

        void notifyOfRemovedMetric(Metric metric,
                           String metricName,
                           MetricGroup group)
        Called when a Metric was should be removed.
        参数:
        metric - the metric that should be removed
        metricName - the name of the metric
        group - the group that contains the metric
